tree.q_text: So we are in agreement on the terms.
But of course, this is a weighty matter, not to be wagered on the turn of a card.
options: What shall be the stakes, then?

tree.q_text: Unfortunately, your opinion on this matters not. Let us begin
You'll soon learn that I am often right, friend
There is a great deal of tradition, is there not?
You don't have much of a choice, do you?
Nothing more than your immortal soul, of course. Now let us begin.
And say so I do. Let us begin.
